Package algorithms.imageProcessing.scaleSpace

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCurvatureScaleSpaceMapper  
    ContourFinder
    class to identify contours in scale space images.
    CSSContourInflectionMaker
    class to map contours from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    CSSContourMatcher
    class to match the contours extracted from two images and match them.
    CSSContourMatcherWrapper
    class to use CSSContourMatcher to match the given contours lists from the edges of two different images with logic to retry with reverse ordered lists when needed for scales < 1..
    CSSCornerMaker
    The code is implemented from interpreting several papers by the authors Farzin Mokhtarian and Alan Mackworth.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceContour
    class holding data for a contour for an edge in a scale space image.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceCornerDetector
    NOTE: this implementation needs to be improved but it is low priority.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceCurvesMaker  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImageMaker
    given an image, creates scale space maps to find inflection points and creates scale space contours for the closed curves from those points.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImageMaker.DescendingScaleSpaceComparator  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImagePoint  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceInflectionMapper
    class to map contours from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    DescendingKComparator
    comparator for absolute value of k, descending sort
    DescendingSigmaComparator  
    DescendingSigmaComparator2
    reorders the lists by the largest sigma in the first item.
    NextContour
    A class to serve the purpose of an adjacency matrix (via rules to choose the "neighbor contour") and the state of "un-visited" for the A* search algorithm.
    ScaleSpaceCurvature  
    ScaleSpaceCurve
    Holds X(t, sigma), Y(t, sigma), k(t, sigma) and the array t where t is the range of indexes for the curve in edges, normalized to values that range from 0 to 1.
    ScaleSpaceCurve2
    extends ScaleSpaceCurve to hold the gaussian 2nd derivatives in x, and y
    ScaleSpaceCurveImage
    Holds the inflection points of a curve convolved over many sigma until there are no new inflection points.
    TransformationPair  
    TransformationPair2<T extends CornerRegion>  
    TransformationPair4  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CurvatureScaleSpaceMapperState
